Player History

Traded from Philly to Oregon on 3/2/2020 (Going to ORE: P Scott Manners, RF Geno Tigart. Going to PHI: C Nezanieru Natsu)...

Hit first career homerun on 9/21/2024, off Roger Dietrich (LBL)...
Won World Championship with Oregon in 2026...
1/31/2029: Gets a new one-year contract worth $2,321,429 through salary arbitration...
Traded from Oregon to Las Vegas on 3/2/2029 (Going to ORE: P Ciro Smith. Going to LVA: 3B Geno Tigart)...
Drove in 7 runs against Springfield on 6/1/2029...
Injured on 6/11/2029 with a Strained Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Transilvania on 8/13/2029...
9/9/2029: Signed a contract extension with Las Vegas, $3,000,000 per year, for 5 years.
Traded from Las Vegas to Chicago on 4/25/2032 (Going to CHI: CF Geno Tigart. Going to LVA: SS Josh Stidham, P Bradford Guzman)...
Injured on 4/28/2032 with a Pulled Groin Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Vancouver on 5/30/2032...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/12/2034, hitting .458 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Injured on 5/24/2034 with a Torn Thigh Muscle, out for full season...
7/13/2034: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $3,450,000 per year, for 3 years.
